Oracle.ManagedDataAccess.Core NuGet Package 2.19.90 README
==========================================================
Release Notes: Oracle Data Provider for .NET Core

August 2020


New Features
============
None


Bug Fixes since Oracle.ManagedDataAccess.Core NuGet Package 2.19.80
===================================================================
31386112 - DERIVEDPARAMETERS ENCOUNTERS ORA-00418 FOR TABLE_TYPE OUTPUT PARAMETER
31637904 - UNABLE TO PROCESS IN-BAND NOTIFICATION FOR CMAN OUTAGE AND PDB RELOCATION
31537092 - ACCUMULATION OF SOCKETS WITH CLOSE_WAIT STATE
31226406 - EZCONNECT+ DOES NOT SUPPORT DRCP CONNECTION CLASS AND PURITY
